snippet: UniCredit, which is trying to raise about 7.5 billion euros in fresh capital to comply with new requirements, offered existing shareholders a significant discount on new stock on Wednesday, sending its shares tumbling.
abstract: UniCredit, which is trying to raise about 7.5 billion euros in fresh capital to comply with new requirements, offered existing shareholders a significant discount on new stock on Wednesday, sending its shares tumbling.

headline.main: UniCredit Offering Weighs on Its Shares
